name: DeserializeXML
description: Deserializes a string in XML format to a ColdFusion object.

params.name: StringToBeDeserialized
params.description: A string that needs to be deserialized.

params.name: useCustomSerializer
params.description: Boolean. Whether to use the custom serializer or not. The default value is true. The custom serializer will be always used for XML deserialization. If false, the XML/JSON deserialization will be done using the default ColdFusion behavior. If any other type is passed with useCustomSerializer as false, then TypeNotSupportedException will be thrown.
